text: wantlq ruasa' alqawm wkbrawhm yhrridwn qawmahum ealaa alaistimrar ealaa alshirk walsbr ealaa taeadud alalht, wayaqulun 'iina ma ja' bih hdha alrasul shay' mdbbar yuqsad minh alriyasat walsyadt, ma samiena bima yadeu 'iilayh fi din abayina min qrysh, wala fi alnsranyt, ma hdha 'iilaa kadhab waftra'
